p.span: Holgate Local Schools Campus (Including the Field House) Will be CLOSED from March 16, 2020 through May 1, 2020.

span.strong: Regular Board Meeting: April 20, 2020 at 6:00 P.M.

span.div: Virutal Meeting on Zoom due to the Stay At Home order by Governor DeWine.
span.p: Below is the Zoom link to join the board meeting scheduled for April 20th at 6:00 pm. There is also the phone number for those who aren’t able to join via the link.

span.style: color: #1c1e21; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

div.span: Our Grab-N-Go meal service is being EXPANDED to include any Holgate student who may need it. Simply email

span.style: color: #1c1e21; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff

div.span: by noon on Thursdays to request meals. Include the students' names, along with an adult's name and contact information. Students receive 5 lunches, sometimes along with extra items provided by St. Peter's Church & individual donations. Distribution of meal bags takes place every Monday in the foyer at the main entrance of the school from 10:30-11:30 am. We know these times are putting increased burdens on our families and we're here to help!
Graded Online Instruction/Grab-N-Go Meal Service Letter
